comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 10 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

issue.title: store.playstation.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://store.playstation.com/en-ca/pages/latest/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fstore.playstation.com%2Fen-ca%2Fpages%2Flatest%2F) ### Comment > It should be very clear what the issue is. However, there’s an issue with your image uploading in this report process. If size of the screenshot is too big, the error message of invalid url or file will be shown. It’s misleading until I realized what’s going on. Converting images from PNG to JPG solved the issue. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/SJNN5bc.jpg)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/Bnm44Ui.jpg)

issue.title: www.youtube.com

labels.name: A: Cannot reproduce
labels.description: Filters devs cannot reproduce this issue

labels.name: Extra
labels.description: Issues, related to AdGuard Extra extension

labels.name: A: Problematic
labels.description: Issues, which cannot be resolved easily

issue.body:
New type of YouTube ads is blocked by our filters. If that does not help, try using our script by following the instructions below.

---

Please enable AdGuard Extra in AdGuard settings (for app users).

---

Browser extension users should install `AdGuard Extra` script into `Tampermonkey` extension.

`AdGuard Extra` download link:
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/beta/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js

After install `Tampermonkey`, change these options like on screenshot:
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68199152-23c17800-ffc6-11e9-99f2-13643aa771ae.png)


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/62641299-f7a54500-b94b-11e9-8a83-885d89abbeec.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8361299/68200995-a3047b00-ffc9-11e9-9999-cdcf35a0f750.png)

comment.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TOGNTKlPUpA](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DTOGNTKlPUpA) ### Comment > All youtube pages are effected in the same way with the adblock on, where any essential information or interactables are gone like videos, titles, like/dislike, and it is impossible to scroll down. The home page is affected in the same way, making it seem like the page isn't loading when no ammount of waiting allows the videos or interactables to appear. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/liJiqHo.png)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/G24rLfv.png)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard Browser extension v1.10.2 Browser: | Edge Stealth mode: | disabled Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Other:
Filter unblocking search ads and self-promotion

Language-specific:
AdGuard Japanese,
AdGuard Spanish/Portuguese,
AdGuard French,
AdGuard Chinese Other extensions used: | boxel rebound, automatic twitch, and 2 other extentions that are made for specific websites that aren't affected
